title: ‘Proactive Finance’ Gives Banks, FinTechs Vision Into Unknown Customer Needs - PYMNTS.com
content: ‘Proactive Finance’ Gives Banks, FinTechs Vision Into Unknown Customer Needs  PYMNTS.com
description: People want to know and trust their banks and financial institutions, says Blend’s Nima Ghamsari, and proactive finance can help FIs delight and retain customers.
